text:
Hello Jarl!!
first of all,  I am really sorry i never replied! Seems like I never got the notification , so I never read the message. 
Secondly, wow! Thats an inspiring introduction! I think you have a really impressive trajectory. 
As for me, I can make you a brief introduction of myself, but it would be awesome if we could Video chat through Slack!
I studied Graphic Design in Argentina, but I always felt like it just wasn’t “enough”. I liked other things and i though i needed to keep on exploring other visual areas. That is when I found about Visual Effects, on my own just researching, as in Argentina all the Visual Effects area is completely unexplored and rather new. Then i found about Escape Studios and did not doubt it: i wanted to come study to London.
I finished my studies last week, but as you can imagine I am still polishing my portfolio. I been looking for jobs but it looks really hard for me not having experience in Visual Effects industry and also not having an european working permit. 
All te same, I have been researching and there is a way for me to get a working VISA for Germany; that would be really good as I will need to leave London (UK in fact) in December, because my 6month as a tourist will end there. 
I can also get that working VISA for Spain / France / Australia. What do you think about that? I think it would be good to arrange a time to video chat about that , so you could give me your opinion and also talk about my work.
I definitely want to come back to London in the close future though. I went to Goldsmiths open day and was completely fascinated by the Visual Cultures and the Computing Arts MA programs; that would be another possibility for me.
To resume, if we could arrange a time for video chatting tomorrow, that would be awesome.
Thanks!
